title: Baked Tofu, Arugula, and Olive Wraps
directions: Place a wrap on a plate. Spread with vegan mayonnaise. Add a drizzle of mustard down the center.
ingredients: Vegan mayonnaise, as needed (or see Variations)
Two big handfuls of baby arugula leaves, or as needed
4 ounces baked tofu, any variety (half of an8-ounce package),Â cut into strips
1/2 cup crisp cucumber, quartered and thinly sliced
1/4 to 1/2 cup chopped briny black olives
